A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie doesn't feel as much like a Star Wars movie and makes some very poor choices regarding its plot. It does have great visuals except for maybe the visit to Kanto Blight\, where the horse-like creatures were very poorly done and the scenery and cinematography diverged greatly from anything we have experienced in a Star Wars movie to date. Wasted opportunities and too many bad fanboy ideas that should have gotten the axe. Overall\, very meh for me.
